Who we are

Know more

Good for animals

For Yazerber, the flock comes first. Lambs are set to pasture on vast, natural grasslands and treated humanely to honor the animals.

Good for the earth.

We’re dedicated to careful and responsible domestic resource management. Our sustainable practices are an investment in our environment to make a lasting change for our future.

Good for customers.

When you raise lamb the way we do—naturally, kindly, sustainably—no wonder it tastes so good. Lamb is a lean and nutritious choice for a delicious change of pace.
